snippet: HELLER--Martin. The members of the Department of Surgery mourn the loss of Mr. Martin Heller, beloved father of our esteemed and longtime faculty member Dr. Keith Heller. We extend our deepest condolences to Dr. Heller and his family on their loss. H. Leon Pachter, MD, F.A.C.S. The George David Stewart Professor and Chair Department of Surgery NYU Langone Medical Center 1/3
lead_paragraph: HELLER--Martin. The members of the Department of Surgery mourn the loss of Mr. Martin Heller, beloved father of our esteemed and longtime faculty member Dr. Keith Heller. We extend our deepest condolences to Dr. Heller and his family on their loss. H. Leon Pachter, MD, F.A.C.S. The George David Stewart Professor and Chair Department of Surgery NYU Langone Medical Center 1/3
